title: Galaxy M53 goes official in India w/ 108MP camera, Dimensity 900 processor, 120Hz display
content:
Outside of the US, the affordable Android market is more competitive than ever. The latest such device to launch exclusively in India is the Samsung Galaxy M53.

description: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy M53 in India, with the affordable smartphone boasting impressive specifications for an enticing price.
